body_html:
This seems to be a Cuda/Driver Issue. I tracked this down on my system and it fails in /external/eigen_archive/unsupported/Eigen/CXX11/src/Tensor/TensorExecutor.h at line 250:

const int max_blocks = device.getNumCudaMultiProcessors() *
device.maxCudaThreadsPerMultiProcessor() / block_size;

In some cases a block_size of 0 is returned from device.maxCudaThreadsPerBlock();
